member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RouteOptions object.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.DistanceUnit
member.summary: Specifies the RouteDistanceUnit used for the Route. Default is Miles.

member.summary: Specifies whether the route is drawn on the map. Default is True.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.RouteColor
member.summary: Specifies the color of the Route line to be drawn on the map. Default is ? or Color(0, 169, 235, 0.7)

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.RouteMode
member.summary: A RouteMode enumeration value specifying the mode of route to return.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.RouteOptimize
member.summary: Specifies how the route is optimized. Default is RouteOptimize.Default, which specifies the route is calculated in order of how the locations are specified.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.RouteWeight
member.summary: The thickness, in pixels, of the route line. Default is 6 pixels.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.RouteZIndex
member.summary: The z-index of the route line. Default is 4.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.SetBestMapView
member.summary: Specifies whether the map view is set to the best view of the route after it is drawn. Default is True.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.ShowDisambiguation
member.summary: Specifies whether a disambiguation dialog box is shown. Default is True, which means the disambiguation dialog box is shown. If False, no disambiguation dialogs are displayed and the route uses the first geocoded response for each location.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.RouteOptions.ShowErrorMessages
member.summary: Specifies whether to show any error messages. Default is True.

members.member:
The Shape object provides Polygon, Polyline and Pushpin functionality combined within a single common object type.
[TypeConverter(typeof(GenericConverter)),

member.name: M:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.Shape.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Shape object of type Pushpin.

member.name: M:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.Shape.#ctor(Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.LatLong)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Shape object of type Pushpin.
member.param: The location of the Pushpin

member.name: M:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.Shape.#ctor(Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.ShapeType,Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.LatLong[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Shape object.
member.param: The type of shape.

An array of LatLong objects representing the points that make up the pushpin, polyline or polygon. If shape is of type Pushpin, a single LatLong is required. If shape is of type polyline, at least two points are required. If shape is of type polygon, at least three points are required.

member.name: M:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.Shape.#ctor(Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.ShapeType,System.Collections.Generic.List{Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.LatLong})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Shape object.
member.param: The type of shape.

An array of LatLong objects representing the points that make up the pushpin, polyline or polygon. If shape is of type Pushpin, a single LatLong is required. If shape is of type polyline, at least two points are required. If shape is of type polygon, at least three points are required.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.Shape.ClientID
member.summary: This is the unique ID that identifies this Shape on the client. Any value this property is set to from Server-Side code, will be ignored.

member.name: P:Simplovation.Web.Maps.VE.Shape.ShowIcon
member.summary: Determines whether to show/hide the icon associated with a Polyline or Polygon. This is ignored for Pushpins.

member.summary: The Shapes custom icon.
